amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the proviso on line 20, restoring the requirement that local investments would be required in Historic Preservation Grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part C of House Report 113-1 to strike the proviso on line 20, restoring the requirement that local investments are required in Historic Preservation Grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Benishek amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 212 (Roll no. 20).

action.text: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Benishek to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A003).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
